featured.text: People have an instinct for interpreting non-verbal communication.
Lyrics to those lullabies can indeed be interpreted as a reflection of the caregiver’s emotions.

definition.zh_def: 解釋或翻譯某事的意義或內容。
definition.en_def: To explain or translate the meaning or content of something.
definition.example: She was asked to interpret the poem for the class.
